      • ANY_CHARSET

        public static final int ANY_CHARSET
        IANA assigned MIB enum numbers. From wap-230-wsp-20010705-a.pdf Any-charset = (Octet 128) Equivalent to the special RFC2616 charset value "*"

    • Method Detail

      • getMimeName

        public static java.lang.String getMimeName(int mibEnumValue)
                                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Map an MIBEnum number to the name of the charset which this number is assigned to by IANA.
        Parameters:
        mibEnumValue - An IANA assigned MIBEnum number.
        Returns:
        The name string of the charset.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If encoding is not supported

      • getMibEnumValue

        public static int getMibEnumValue(java.lang.String mimeName)
                           throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Map a well-known charset name to its assigned MIBEnum number.
        Parameters:
        mimeName - The charset name.
        Returns:
        The MIBEnum number assigned by IANA for this charset.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If encoding is not supported
